Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
In test dapp, click "send EIP 1559 transaction".
Expected Result: MetaMask notification screen is shown. Current gas fee is displayed. "Site suggested" button is displayed.
Notes: Take a note for the current gas fee.

Test Steps: On notification screen, click "Site suggested" button.
Expected Result: Edit gas fee screen is shown. Three gas options are shown: low, market, aggressive. Site suggested gas fee is shown. "Advanced" button is displayed.

Test Steps: On edit gas fee screen, click "Advanced" button.
Expected Result: Advanced gas fee edit screen is shown. Editable max base fee and priority fee input fields are displayed.

Test Steps: In max base fee and priority fee input fields, enter new values, and click "Save".
Test Data: e.g. 25 for max base fee and 2 for priority fee
Expected Result: On notification screen, the displayed gas fee is different from previous one.
Notes: Take a note for the new gas fee.

Test Steps: On notification screen , click "Confirm" to proceed the transaction.
Expected Result: The transaction appears in the activity list. The amount is shown in the activity list item.

The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount are shown in the item details. Values of displayed total gas fee, priority fee, and max fee per gas are the new values that we changed in previous step.

Test Steps: Expand the activity log for the transaction.
Expected Result: The created, submitted and confirmed activity are shown in the activity log.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
